doc:
Slappy White https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slappy_White 0 Melvin Edward "Slappy" White (September 27, 1921 – November 7, 1995) was an American comedian and actor. He worked with Redd Foxx on the Chitlin' circuit of stand-up comedy during the 1950s and 1960s. He appeared on the television shows Sanford and Son, That's My Mama, Blossom, and Cybill and in the films Mr. Saturday Night and Amazon Women on the Moon. Melvin_Edward_"_Slappy_"_White ( September_27_,_1921 – November_7_,_1995 ) was an_American_comedian_and_actor . He worked with Redd_Foxx on the_Chitlin '_circuit of stand-up_comedy during the_1950s_and_1960s . He appeared on the_television shows Sanford_and_Son , That 's My_Mama , Blossom , and Cybill and in the_films_Mr._Saturday_Night and Amazon_Women on the_Moon .
